file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Starkina Maria
    email: starkina@surfstudio.ru
     
paths:
  /billings/paymentCards:
    get:
      summary: Возвращает список привязанных карт пользователя 
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: 
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentCards"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
    post:
      summary: Добавление новой карты
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AddCardRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/3dSecResponse"       
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /billings/setAutopayment:
    post:
      summary: Включение и отключение автоплатежа
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/SetAutopaymentRequest"
      responses:
        "204":
          description: "Успех"        
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /billings/paymentCards/{id}:
    delete:
      summary: Удаление карты
      parameters:
      - name: id
        required: true
        in: path
        schema:
          type: string     
      responses:
        "204":
          description: "Успех"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/billings/paymentCards": get: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: item: at 1:241: parse schema: resolve "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentCards": external "models.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
